Articles.Content:
Hello. I'm Templar. I like to think that I'm an actual aerospace and advanced technology contractor within my own little KSP world, and I call my self 'Eagle Aeronautics'.

Anyway, just found out I can't put a file in my post, for some reason. ![-_-](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_sleep.png)' So you just get pictures...

Crafts:

EA C-V / T-V 'Minervan'

![45738fad0d09a2f8df6be27102783a0e.jpg](http://i.gyazo.com/45738fad0d09a2f8df6be27102783a0e.jpg)

EA C-T 115 'Tundra'

![fdb9b18a2af169035936b8e6d436e17a.jpg](http://i.gyazo.com/fdb9b18a2af169035936b8e6d436e17a.jpg)

-----

![f1deab33c958d2ceeb319c6731676f39.png](http://i.gyazo.com/f1deab33c958d2ceeb319c6731676f39.png)

THIS POST WILL SOON BE REFORMATTED ALONG WITH NEW CRAFTS AND FILES. 

**Edited <time datetime="2016-02-01T12:04:59Z" title="02/01/2016 12:04  PM" data-short="8 yr">February 1, 2016</time> by Templar**

Welcome to the forums! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

That craft looks quite cool.
I dig the intake placement. Welcome to the forums, and happy landings!
Fantastic way to join the forums. This is a pretty sleek looking bird!
Dude, keep up the good work!

"I like to think that I'm an actual aerospace and advanced technology contractor within my own little KSP world, and I call my self 'Eagle Aeronautics'." 

You know you can start a sort of "Company" on the Ship Builders sub forum? I don't know exactly HOW, but you could get people to help design crafts and TEST THEM for free!
That seems cool! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Thanks, everyone! Right now I'm working on a VTOL. Still working out the formalities...

> 
> That seems cool! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Thanks, everyone! Right now I'm working on a VTOL. Still working out the formalities...

Yep! You can start a company at the rocket builder section! Just be sure to start out with a basis ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Your first craft is a good sign really ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Thanks, again! Here's that VTOL I was talking about. 78 tons of pure badassery! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

EA C-V/T-V 'Minervan'

![e5d875d0c17c6fa3dc6288beea5ad641.png](http://i.gyazo.com/e5d875d0c17c6fa3dc6288beea5ad641.png)

![554685bad0032750161dc59a8e95f9ca.png](http://i.gyazo.com/554685bad0032750161dc59a8e95f9ca.png)

![9eb2641ad474850b9d4c2f127d5d0e4f.png](http://i.gyazo.com/9eb2641ad474850b9d4c2f127d5d0e4f.png)

Now, I will work on something else!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-03T16:30:50Z" title="05/03/2015 04:30  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 3, 2015</time> by Templar**
Ya know, that first plane looks like an SU-34.
That's what I intended, hense '34'.

> 
> Thanks, again! Here's that VTOL I was talking about. 78 tons of pure badassery! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> [http://i.gyazo.com/554685bad0032750161dc59a8e95f9ca.png](http://i.gyazo.com/554685bad0032750161dc59a8e95f9ca.png)

> 
> Now, I will work on something else!

WOAH ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) +rep

Thanks! I'm now working on a larger cargo/transport STOL SSTO. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

![3109bd0bc8dc6714014809a29cf1c906.png](http://i.gyazo.com/3109bd0bc8dc6714014809a29cf1c906.png)

Lager transport? Hmm...

Nicely done!
Thanks! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Just updated the OP. 

I'm looking for someone/some people to make a company with! Eagle Aeronautics will focus on large transports and utility VTOLs! PM me or post here if you would like to help. Thanks. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

New experimental craft in its design phase:

![c3fe38a747f5686a17e5cf41ca712148.png](http://i.gyazo.com/c3fe38a747f5686a17e5cf41ca712148.png)
If you are looking to share the craft files, upload them to [kerbalx](http://kerbalx.com). Then you can post a link here.
Thanks! I will do that, in the future. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

![205e2252052c61bd4893d58e4f61ea82.png](http://i.gyazo.com/205e2252052c61bd4893d58e4f61ea82.png)

Name: TBD

Hello! I am trying to make a return to the vehicle crafting business. I've got a few crafts in the works currently and I will try to get some pictures up shortly. Thanks again, to everyone who commented.

> 
> 
> 11 hours ago, Templar said:
> 
> 
> Hello! I am trying to make a return to the vehicle crafting business. I've got a few crafts in the works currently and I will try to get some pictures up shortly. Thanks again, to everyone who commented.
> 

Damn, that necropost.

> 
> 
> Just now, The Optimist said:
> 
> 
> Damn, that necropost.
> 

It's his thread and he has new information. His post is not a necro.
Woot! Good luck, buddeh!

Thank you, Iago, Majorjim! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")  

Here are the crafts that I've constructed past the testing phase:  

EA C-R 1 A medium range reconnaissance jet capable of carrying lethal payloads.

 [https://i.gyazo.com/30a47f47281b5d98f021247c24a58006.png](https://i.gyazo.com/30a47f47281b5d98f021247c24a58006.png%5B/img%5D)

 [https://i.gyazo.com/6fa56a56a488815ed86586b3be0a1cd1.png](https://i.gyazo.com/6fa56a56a488815ed86586b3be0a1cd1.png) 

 [https://i.gyazo.com/f331fbe71bd10a5a380a176117d384f7.png](https://i.gyazo.com/f331fbe71bd10a5a380a176117d384f7.png) 

Stats: 

Parts - 94

Mass - 19.8 t

Inspirations:  

F-22 "Raptor"

J-20

EA R-R / E-E 2 A medium range SSTO whose purpose is to scout out an appropriate area for an outpost or research site.

 [https://i.gyazo.com/b19f6d4f7d4634b8a4586a5abe6d999b.png](https://i.gyazo.com/b19f6d4f7d4634b8a4586a5abe6d999b.png) 

[https://i.gyazo.com/c98744f55c79c9bcce7fd0ab22896cc9.png](https://i.gyazo.com/c98744f55c79c9bcce7fd0ab22896cc9.png%5B) 

 [https://i.gyazo.com/1e02fdb2589529ad2863cfb29462bcbf.png](https://i.gyazo.com/1e02fdb2589529ad2863cfb29462bcbf.png) 

Stats:

Parts - 112

Mass - 42.1 t

Inspirations: 

Astro-Cruiser SSTO by Overfloater

[Construction incomplete] EA C-T 3: A long range SSTO whose purpose is to deliver cargo to specific areas.

 [https://i.gyazo.com/5df745d320f5d9b16ac65eafbcb21d94.png](https://i.gyazo.com/5df745d320f5d9b16ac65eafbcb21d94.png) 

 [https://i.gyazo.com/b9b0cfce1a02db55c6a0245734039169.png](https://i.gyazo.com/b9b0cfce1a02db55c6a0245734039169.png) 

 [https://i.gyazo.com/a4d858420ac2964e342a65fc6089d8d3.png](https://i.gyazo.com/a4d858420ac2964e342a65fc6089d8d3.png) 

Stats:

Mass - 127.4 t

Inspirations:

Astroliner VIII "Nova" SSTO by Overfloater  

I don't know how to post images anymore so you get links!

Sorry about this.
